snippet.title: Capitalist Albania and the Pyramid Crisis
snippet.description:
Max and Ashton tell the story of Albania's economic switch from communism to capitalism and the ensuing crisis of pyramid schemes, which resulted in the Albanian Civil War.

Featuring “Velvet” by Peyruis (from Audio Library) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r-rU0pZdtTA], “Afternoon Nap” by Ghostrifter (from Audio Library) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K9ERmGNzdyo], “Crying Over You (Instrumental)” by christophermorrow (from Audio Library) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hiYs5z4xdBU] and “Tropical Sensation” by Mike Leite (from Audio Library) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hc6r06k-ADA].

Featuring media from Wikipedia, A Daily Odyssey, Albanian Daily News, Research Leap, Investor.gov, Prishtina Insight, Smoki Musaraj, Albanian Pyramids blog, The Red Pheonix, Defense Online, Truth in Advertising, Cincinnati.com, The News Tribe, and YouTube users Team Leonard, 
Isabella S.C. Scanderbeg and kropny. All footage is accessed under Fair Use Copyright Law 17 U.S.C. § 107 due to educational nature, or via Wikimedia, Audio Library, or Creative Commons 2.5 licenses. 

Please like and subscribe with notifications for more Quantum Blackboard content! Feel free to email us at quantumblackboard@gmail.com with questions or comments!

Bibliography (MLA 8)
- Bosley, Stacie, director. How to Spot a Pyramid Scheme. YouTube, 2 Apr. 2019, https://youtu.be/SBGfHk91Vrk.
- Chepkemoi, Joyce. "The Biggest Industries In Albania." WorldAtlas, Nov. 20, 2017, worldatlas.com/articles/which-are-the-biggest-industries-in-albania.html.
- Jarvis, Christopher. “The Rise and Fall of Albania's Pyramid Schemes.” International Monetary Fund, 2000, www.imf.org/external/pubs/ft/fandd/2000/03/jarvis.htm.
- News Desk. “Ponzi Scheme Mastermind ‘Double Shah’ Dead.” Pakistan Today, 30 Oct. 2015, www.pakistantoday.com.pk/2015/10/30/double-shah-dead/.
- Pike, John E. “Albanian Civil War (1997).” Global Security, 26 June 2013, www.globalsecurity.org/military/world/war/albania.htm.
- Rare Earth, et al., directors. The Pyramid Scheme That Collapsed a Nation. YouTube, 13 Oct. 2018, https://youtu.be/lMUtU0tOmNE.
- “Albania.” Wikipedia, Wikimedia Foundation, 11 Apr. 2020, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albania
- “Albania GDP 1984-2019.” Trading Economics, tradingeconomics.com/albania/gdp.
- “Albania - Industry.” Encyclopedia of the Nations, www.nationsencyclopedia.com/economies/Europe/Albania-INDUSTRY.html.
- “Albanian Civil War.” Wikipedia, Wikimedia Foundation, 12 Apr. 2020, en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albanian_Civil_War.
- “Energy and Natural Resources.” Edited by Raymond Zickel and Walter R Iwaskiw, Albania: A Country Study, 1994, countrystudies.us/albania/96.htm.
- “Fatos Nano.” Wikipedia, Wikimedia Foundation, 22 Dec. 2019, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fatos_Nano
“Operation Alba.” Wikipedia, Wikimedia Foundation, 15 Jan. 2020, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Operation_Alba
- “Pyramid Schemes.” Investor.gov, U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, www.investor.gov/protect-your-investments/fraud/types-fraud/pyramid-schemes.
- “The Rise of Albanian Communism.” Albanian Tourist, 2014, www.albaniantourist.com/albanian-communism.html.

NOTE: This bibliography is formatted according to the limitations of a YouTube video description.

Copyright 2020 Quantum Blackboard. A film by Quantum Blackboard with Max Witwer and Ashton Call.
